summary: This document is a letter from an unnamed sender to Deutsche Bank, authorizing Darren Indyke to have signing authority and verbal confirmation on accounts associated with a financial relationship. The letter includes contact information and is marked confidential.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is granted signing authority and verbal confirmation authority on accounts related to the financial relationship mentioned in the letter.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is addressed in the letter as the contact person at Deutsche Bank.

connections.description: Darren Indyke is communicating with Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank regarding account management.

keyFacts: The letter authorizes Darren Indyke to have signing authority on accounts.
The letter is addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank.
